title: Stuck in home page after i pressed accept button to join ARAM
body:
Guys i need your help. I don't understand why this happened sometimes. I qued for ARAM and then i pressed accept button but i couldn't get into pick page , i mean i was stuck in the home page of lol. If i click mouse, then lol client turned to be no response, and this will last until countdown and i did join the game but i couldn't see what champ i picked randomly or set runes and masteries which was really uncomfortable...
Is there a problem with my computer or internet? It happened sometimes but in fact, most of time...
HELP

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
